response.original_title: “New Gundam and protagonist come to light!”【MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM U.C. ENGAGE】
response.overview: A special documentary to commemorate MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM U.C. ENGAGE. This documentary is set to feature a behind-the-scenes look at the making of the Gundam series and the development of U.C. ENGAGE. Watch and discover new charms hidden within the wide world of the Universal Century.
response.title: “New Gundam and protagonist come to light!”【MOBILE SUIT GUNDAM U.C. ENGAGE】
